notes:
1-3 Wild Horses at once will spawn every 3 hours (starting at the [[Server Save]]) if [[Horse]]s are [[Horse Station World Change|on the loose]]. It can be tamed with [[Sugar Oat]]s, which unlocks the [[War Horse]] mount. Anywhere from 30-180+ sugar oats may be needed before one succeeds. Killing regular horses on the loose won't make the Wild Horse appear.

[[File:Wild_Horse_Tamed_-mount-.png|thumb|left|Successfully taming the Wild Horse.]]
name: Wild Horse
location:
Near the [[Thais Troll Cave]] entrance ({{Mapper Coords|126.215|126.3|7|2|text=here}}) during the [[Horse Station World Change]]. <noinclude><gallery mode="nolines">
Wild Horse spawn locations.png|The yellow dots are the spawn locations
</gallery></noinclude>
strategy: They yield no loot or experience. If you kill it, you will see the following message: {{Sound|With its last strength the horse runs to safety.}} If you want to tame one, you can put [[Parcel]]s and [[Crate]]s around the spawn to trap them.
